alert.note: Alert for Neosho; Wilson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:27PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wilson and northwestern Neosho Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 527 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chanute. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chanute, Earlton and Chanute Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
